communication.management
Class DownloadManager

java.lang.Object
  communication.management.DownloadManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
DownloadDatasetObserver
public class DownloadManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements DownloadDatasetObserver

Manage Download from ESGF data nodes, implements DownloadDatasetObserver for be notified of dataset download changes.

Author:
Karem Terry
